nodes.text: The Missile Attack Launcher (MAL) was a repulsor artillery unit used by the Zann Consortium during the Galactic Civil War.
It was capable of configuring into a long-range missile launcher; however, when it did this, it was rendered immobile.

It was armed with three turreted concussion missile launchers and was capable of shooting them in rapid succession; however, this resulted in reduced range. When deployed, it would utilize its missile system for increased range attacks against enemy forces. They were also capable of switching between the standard concussion missile armaments and carbonite missiles, the latter of which were capable of slowing enemy vehicles and administering heavy damage to infantry squads.
